overview:
Adam Ratani is British based Entrepreneur, Investor and Consultant who has business interests in the United States, Europe and Asia.

Born, raised and educated in London, Adam is a highly motivated and driven individual who gives up for nobody to achieve what he wants, regardless of the effort or time required.

He runs a very tight ship and lives by a strict routine each day. The only downside is his heavy coffee habit for which he apologise profusely.

His recent ventures and investments include two tech start up’s based in London, which are currently working on a new Social-Network due to launch at the end of 2012 and a new online portal to increase the opportunities available to students, before and after graduating from University.

Adam resides with his family in Holland Park, West London.
